Articles.Content:
Hey guys,

 

I was trying to start my game up last night/this morning and I ran into the problem: 

http://imgur.com/0YhOose (The forum decided NOT to recognise this URL to the post, don't ask me why I didn't just insert other media)

[edited by Snark to insert inline image]

 

It appears that it crashed on the file:

Squad/Spaces/mk2inlineinternal/internal/mk2inlineinternal

 

I've tried the following:

- Remove all mods

- Reinstall the game - which it works once, then crash again on next startup

- Reinstall all mods

- Uninstall all mods again

- Run directly from App file (instead of via steam)

- Run via steam

- Remove crashed part, at which another mk2 part is crashing

- Remove all pre-existing craft

- Reinstalling all pre-existing craft

 

And it decided not to work.

 

Thanks for your help.
This happened to me on version 1.1.3. I sent a report to squad, and they fixed it (or the bug resolved itself). Try playing in 1.2 or 1.0.5. It works fine for me there. Hope I could be of assistance!

It happens all the time for me.

It will crash maybe 1 out of 3. When it crashes it will do it several time in a row.

Once loaded it's good till I shut it down.

Always did that for me. IDK maybe from 1.1

 

ME

Moving to Technical Support.

(Incidentally, the reason it didn't auto-inline your image is that you didn't include the ".png" at the end. You need the URL of the actual image file itself, not the imgur page.)
We really need your logs before we can diagnose this, please take a look here.
